{{Infobox Berry |name = #11 Bluk |image = [[File:Bluk.png]] |caption = Though this small, delicately skinned Berry is blue in color, it dyes the mouth black when eaten. |growtime = 5m 30s |harvest = 9 berries |replant = 40% |points = 20 |flavor =
* 0 spicy * 10 dry * 10 sweet * 0 bitter * 0 sour }} '''Bluk''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Chesto]] and at least 1 [[Leppa]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-200s || 200-250s || 250-300s || 300-350s || 350-700s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:BlukTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:BlukTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:BlukTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in the following way to obtain Bluk berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[Leppa]] || || || [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 26px;" | || || || || |- | [[Chesto]] || || || [[Chesto]] || |- | || [[Leppa]] || || || [[Leppa]] |}

{{Infobox Berry |name = Bluk |image = [[File:Bluk.png]] |caption = Though this small, delicately skinned Berry is blue in color, it dyes the mouth black when eaten. |growtime = 5m 30s |harvest = 9 berries |replant = 40% |points = 20 |flavor =

It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Chesto]] and at least 1 [[Leppa]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !!
